name: @recon-raccoon/framework
description: ü¶ù Recon Raccoon framework is a automated OSINT for threat intelligence and mapping attack surfaces.

scripts.get:latest:sherlock: git submodule add --depth 1 --branch master https://github.com/sherlock-project/sherlock.git sherlock && cd sherlock && git checkout master -- sherlock/resources/data.json && cd .. && git add . && git commit -m "Add/update Sherlock submodule with specific file"
